subject: Stanley Cup
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Anze Kopitar, who has scored 25 goals or more in each of the last five seasons, has had a breakout postseason after playing in relative obscurity in Los Angeles for six seasons.
snippet: Anze Kopitar, who has scored 25 goals or more in each of the last five seasons, has had a breakout postseason after playing in relative obscurity in Los Angeles for six seasons.
